summary:
With a diverse and eclectic background, I bring a unique perspective to the table, always thinking outside the box as a professional. My journey began as a producer in Brazil, where I thrived in roles such as an executive and infrastructure production manager for large-scale events, including Rock in Rio. Additionally, I led a production team responsible for creating 10 episodes of a documentary series for Brazil's most prominent sports channel.

Seeking greater stability, I transitioned to the realm of sales at Warner Music, where I adeptly handled musical rights and license agreements between Warner and various agencies and production companies.

Upon arriving in Europe, my career took exciting turns. I achieved recognition as one of the top 10 participants at a startup weekend hosted at Google Headquarters. Subsequently, I had the privilege of working on projects with renowned companies such as Facebook and Bloomberg while residing in Dublin.

However, it was upon reaching Amsterdam that I truly found my calling, both in the city and in my professional pursuits.

Throughout my journey, I have consistently impressed my colleagues with boundless energy and an unwavering commitment to achieving objectives. I firmly believe in the power of data as a guiding map and am passionate about working intelligently to deliver exceptional results.

In summary, my diverse background and experiences have shaped me into a resourceful and forward-thinking professional, poised to contribute my unique skills and perspectives to any endeavor I undertake.

profile_positions.description:
-	Supported the director and the producers.
-	Managed daily reports with deals between sponsors and clients.
-	Supported the film crew on set.
-	Researched to generate content.
-	Managed the producers team in 3 episodes of “Historia do Voo Livre” serie - Off Chanel.
profile_positions.title: Executive Producer

profile_positions.description:
- 	Co-founder/Partner - producer for “KT” event producing company;
-      Managed bar teams many times bigger them 50 people;
- 	Created, promoted and executed full cycle of events such as: 
.		Glow Project​ (5 editions with 5 different cities in Brazil and received over 30,000 guests).
.		RedCup Party​ (received more than 10,000 guests with 10 editions).
.		New Year's Virada Mágica on Rosa Beach , SC - OpenBar event (already in 6th edition welcomed over 45,000 guests with tickets from R$300,00 to R$1,000). 
-	Developed infrastructure and logistic of the event, and operations management of the bar. 
- 	Prepared content, and maintenance of social networking events, as well as the company.
profile_positions.title: Event Manager

profile_positions.description:

-	Led the project for approval by the public organ of the MINC.
